attributes.action: Tackling the 'moral collapse' in EVERY Sector of Society
attributes.additional_details: This petition calls on ABSOLUTE CLARITY AND EQUALITY OF ACTION from David Cameron that government will tackle the 'moral collapse' in all sectors of society with equal measure and equal change in any necessary policy. This should include politicians, bankers, police and the media as well as the rich and the poorer sectors of society, This is not an exhaustive list. The moral collapse of British society is an across class problem and should be dealt with accordingly.
